title: TikTok preparing for U.S. shut-off on Sunday
author: xnhbx
aiHeadline: BREAKING: TikTok Braces for Potential US Shutdown on Sunday, Because Who Needs Viral Dance Challenges and Lip-Syncing Teens Anyway, Right? The Popular Social Media App is Preparing for the Worst, and Users are Left Wondering What They Did to Deserve Such a Fate

title: Nevada court shuts down police use of federal loophole for civil forfeiture
author: greyface-
aiHeadline: Nevada Court Puts the Kibosh on Police Using a Sneaky Federal Loophole to Seize People's Stuff Without Due Process, Because Who Needs the 4th Amendment Anyway? Just Kidding, This is a Big Win for Civil Liberties and a Blow to Overzealous Cops

title: Why is Cloudflare Pages' bandwidth unlimited?
author: MattSayar
aiHeadline: Cloudflare Pages is Like That One Friend Who Has an Unlimited Data Plan and Insists on Sharing it With Everyone, Offering Unlimited Bandwidth Because Why Not, and We're All Just Over Here Wondering What Sorcery is Behind This Generous Free Tier

title: Generate audiobooks from E-books with Kokoro-82M
author: csantini
aiHeadline: Get Ready to Have Your Mind Blown by Kokoro-82M, the AI Tool That Can Turn E-Books into Audiobooks, Because Who Needs Human Narrators When You Can Have Robots Doing the Heavy Lifting, and Bookworms Everywhere are Rejoicing at the Prospect of Having More Time to Devour Even More Pages

title: A marriage proposal spoken in office jargon
author: ohjeez
aiHeadline: In a Bold Move, Some Genius Decided to Propose Marriage Using Only Office Jargon, Because What Says 'I Love You' More Than Synergy, Disruption, and Paradigm Shifts? This Couple is Clearly Meant to Be, and Their Love Will Probably Be a Game-Changer in the World of Corporate Speak
